movie.title: Underground
movie.description_intro: It's the mid 1970s and the Weather Underground Organization (WUO), a radical (and violent) offshoot of the Students for a Democratic Society, explains to leftist filmmakers the difficulties and experiences of being underground and wanted by the federal government.
movie.description_full: It's the mid 1970s and the Weather Underground Organization (WUO), a radical (and violent) offshoot of the Students for a Democratic Society, explains to leftist filmmakers the difficulties and experiences of being underground and wanted by the federal government.

movies.title: Pin Up!: The Movie
movies.summary: Contemporary pin up girls... and the women who inspire them.
movies.description_full: Contemporary pin up girls... and the women who inspire them.

movies.title: The Great Ecstasy of Woodcarver Steiner
movies.title_english: The Great Ecstasy of Woodcarver Steiner
movies.title_long: The Great Ecstasy of Woodcarver Steiner (1974)
movies.summary: A study of the psychology of a champion ski-jumper, whose full-time occupation is carpentry.
movies.description_full: A study of the psychology of a champion ski-jumper, whose full-time occupation is carpentry.
movies.synopsis: A study of the psychology of a champion ski-jumper, whose full-time occupation is carpentry.

movies.title: Slow Ride Home
movies.summary: 8 members of Seattle-based Soldiers of Destiny scooter club attempt a 3,700 mile odyssey from Florida to Washington, at the less than blazing speed of around 45 miles an hour.
movies.description_full: 8 members of Seattle-based Soldiers of Destiny scooter club attempt a 3,700 mile odyssey from Florida to Washington, at the less than blazing speed of around 45 miles an hour.
movies.synopsis: 8 members of Seattle-based Soldiers of Destiny scooter club attempt a 3,700 mile odyssey from Florida to Washington, at the less than blazing speed of around 45 miles an hour.

movies.title: Sinä päivänä aurinko putosi
movies.summary: Tracing the past of her deceased grandfather who worked as a young doctor in the Red Cross hospital of HirSwiss-Japanese filmmaker Aya Domenig, the granddaughter of a doctor on duty during the 1945 atomic bombing of Hiroshima, approaches the experience of her deceased grandfather by tracing the lives of a doctor and of former nurses who once shared the same experience. While gathering the memories and present views of these last survivors, the nuclear disaster in Fukushima strikes and history seems to repeat itself.oshima after the atomic bomb was dropped over the city, the filmmaker encounters doctors and nurses who went through similar experiences to his at the time. Right up until his death in 1991, her grandfather was never able to speak about his experiences, but the formidable stories and openness of her protagonists bring her closer to his past. When on March 11th, 2011 a new nuclear catastrophe takes place in Fukushima, the present catches up with her journey to the past. Her ...
